Pre-Game Insights: Lionel Messi will miss Argentina's final Group A fixture at the 2024 Copa America against Peru due to a sore throat, fever, and a tweaked right hamstring.
Assistant coach Walter Samuel confirmed that changes will be made to Argentina's starting lineup, with those who did not feature in Argentina's first two group matches expected to play against Peru.
Others: Manager Lionel Scaloni will serve a touchline ban for the match.
